message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product for $12500. It's a truly exceptional item, and I believe it will be a valuable asset to you.

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer, but $12500 is a bit out of my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your perspective, $7000 is lower than I can accept. Considering the unique qualities and long-term value of this product, I'd be willing to come down to $12000.

Hello Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $12000, but it's still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer $9500. This is the highest I'm willing to go, considering I have another option to buy the product from John for $8000.
